title: Blocked vertx thread and node drops out of sync
body:
### Description
Exceptions like the one below repeatedly printing and node was out of sync.  Restarting fixed it.


Reported via internal slack https://consensys.slack.com/archives/C014L7NGS2G/p1595794604181300

moved the metrics to a settableGauge which will at least stop that issue.
Will close this.
